resources.string: Temperatures have reached safe levels. Mining resumed.
Put device on charge to enable mining.
Connect to a Wi-Fi network to enable mining.
Are you sure you want to start mining?
Your device is currently on battery power.
Your device is currently not connected to a Wi-Fi network.
Cannot resume mining when device is cooling.
Mining paused until temperatures return to safe levels.
WAZNDroid is still mining in the background.
Start mining on your mobile device safely and efficiently
WAZNDroid provides useful information about your mining activities and prevents your device from overheating.
By using this application, you confirm your knowledge and acceptance of the Disclaimer
Do you want to support the project?
Wazn donation address will then be used for mining.
Do you want to stop mining?
Restart mining process to apply the new settings.
If you close the app, the mining process will be stopped.
You will have to restart the mining process in order for the new parameters to be applied.
Take a look at my WAZNDroid stats! I\'m currently mining on my Android device. Download the app to start mining on your phone: https://wazndroid.wazn.io/
"Did you know you can mine cryptocurrencies on any Android device? Download the app to start mining on your phone: https://wazndroid.wazn.io/

This application implements two layers of protection for your device.

The first one is the As-Much-As-You-Can (AMAYC) machine learning algorithm that can predict when your device will overheat and pause the miner until the device\'s temperature has normalized.

The second one is a static temperature monitoring that will automatically pause the miner if your device reaches one of the maximum temperatures defined in the settings.

Turning this feature off might cause damage to your device. Are you sure you want to continue?

This application implements two layers of protection for your device.

The first one is the As-Much-As-You-Can (AMAYC) machine learning algorithm that can predict when your device will overheat and pause the miner until the device\'s temperature has normalized.

The second one is a static temperature monitoring that will automatically pause the miner if your device reaches one of the maximum temperatures defined in the settings.

Turning this feature off might cause damage to your device.
If you would like to help build this project, you can send BTC, ETH, LTC or WAZN to the project\'s wallet. Thanks for your support!
Your device will start cooling when the CPU or battery reach the specified temperatures.\n\nThe cooldown threshold defines the temperature at which the application will resume the mining process.
An open-source cryptocurrency miner for Android devices.

Running your CPU at a high intensity for a prolonged duration may result in negative effects such as: battery drainage, slow response time, overheating, and may cause permanent damage to your device.

We recommend using the Temperature Control settings and a low number of CPU Cores to prevent damage to your device.

By using this application, you assume full responsibility for any damage that may be caused to your device, property or self.
No wallet address? Click here to create one.
Your device does not have a sensor to read the processor temperature, or it is impossible to retrieve it. You should mine with caution and monitor your device to check if it\'s overheating.
Your device does not have a sensor to read the battery temperature, or it is impossible to retrieve it. You should mine with caution and monitor your device to check if it\'s overheating.

The Minimum Payout value can be changed on the pool settings page.

%pool_url
When this option is enabled and the application encounters a fatal error, your default email client will be opened to let you send the detailed debug and stack trace report to our team.
Mining process has been abruptly aborted.
Your device\'s architecture is old and not fully supported. Expect low performance.

Your application has been updated to the latest version.

Here are the new features:

Are you sure you want to enable Performance Mode?

The following features will be disabled:
- Hashrate meter and chart
- Temperature chart
- Payout widget
- Statistics refresh
- Hashrate refresh delay
- Formatted mining log
A new version of the application is available. To update to this version, uninstall your current application and install the new one.\n\nDo you want to download it now?
The pools repository is unreachable, using default pool.
Need help getting started? Did you encounter an issue with the application?
To help us better understand your problem, start by copying the debug information of your device.
Send us a message through one of our official communication channels, and make sure to paste the debug information.
You don\'t have the latest version.
You need to provide your Wazn wallet address to start mining.
